files.description: Deterministic pipeline entrypoint that sets fixed seeds, runs the end-to-end workflow, and writes outputs/results.json, outputs/figure.png, outputs/run_stamp.json, and outputs/logs/*.log with stable schemas.
Core pipeline implementation providing deterministic data generation/processing, metrics computation, and artifact-writing functions used by the entrypoint.
Logging utilities that configure run-scoped file logging into outputs/logs with consistent formatting and reproducible metadata.
Plotting module that creates a deterministic matplotlib figure and saves it to outputs/figure.png with controlled style and rendering settings.
Defines stable JSON schemas/keys for results and run_stamp artifacts and validates/normalizes output dictionaries before writing.
Small deterministic utilities including hashing, environment capture, atomic writes, and seed initialization helpers.
Roadmap document updated to link the generated pipeline artifacts (results.json, figure.png, run_stamp.json, and logs) as the first completed deliverable.
Coverage matrix updated to include the deterministic pipeline entrypoint deliverable and links to the produced artifacts for verification.
CI workflow that installs dependencies, runs scripts/run_pipeline.py, and uploads outputs artifacts to ensure reproducibility in CI/CD.
Pinned runtime dependencies (e.g., numpy, matplotlib) required to run the deterministic pipeline consistently across environments.

missionDescription: Implement a deterministic pipeline entrypoint (e.g., scripts/run_pipeline.py) that writes ./outputs/results.json, ./outputs/figure.png, ./outputs/run_stamp.json, and ./outputs/logs/*.log with a stable schema and fixed random seeds; then link these artifacts from /outputs/roadmap_v1.md and the coverage matrix as the first completed deliverable.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Establishes determinism as the core lever for stable iteration: a deterministic entrypoint that emits fixed-schema JSON + a figure directly enables regression testing, repeatable CI runs, and unblocks...
